attributes.title: trumpscoochiehair👁👄👁

DROP IT DOWN AND WOBBLE, WOBBLE UP,MAMI BOOTED UP” i had a seizure. And i went in coma for 10 years.🤡

attributes.title: Horrific
attributes.review: It just kept spamming and spamming me and it’s absolutely disgusting and ridiculous for an orange out of all people to have this app not worth your time please don’t download it plus it gives your phone a virus not good!!! 🤭🤭

attributes.title: THIS APP is THE BEST ✨SIKEEEE🌈✨

attributes.title: Heart attack on sight 🧚🏻‍♂️🦧🌈✨
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to keep track with what our ✨beautiful ✨ orange oompa loopa was doing. BUT when I opened the app—- the racial atrocities I saw legitimately gave me a heart attack. I was sent to our local heart hospital and saved my the miracle of an actual leader.

attributes.title: ✨D I C K✨
attributes.review: this app is TERRIBLE it sent me to JUPITER!!!!! i cant believe how nasty the cover is! it looks like a saggy hot cheeto i nearly through up when i saw it NASTY. i had to jump on my dog and ride to never land where i cant see that again. cant believe that’s the face of our state.

attributes.title: VERRY BAD MESSED WITH MY PHONE!!!
attributes.review: The app is not functional :(. The ap was very glitchy and made my phone slower in general. Trying to use the app Is verry hard. Not worth the download. Hoping now that I deleted it my phone will work like it used to:(

attributes.title: no ❤️
attributes.review: This app is absolutely terrible your honor! The orange man doesn’t like anyone who isn’t white!!!! I installed this app due to personal reasons, but the app is terrible and everything is all over the place and it called me a racial slur!!! 0/5 stars!!

attributes.title: STOP THE ORANGE!!!
attributes.review: We must dog everything in our power to stop the orange from taking over our wonderful country. I opened the app and all I saw was orange propaganda and extremist views. Also the app kept crashing and was lagging. Y’all should fix that.

attributes.title: pitiful
attributes.review: Tbh i’m here to actually give a review, plus i don’t like trump in any way. When you first open the app you have to see the orange man himself and i really do not appreciate that. Also, he’s trying to take TikTok down soooo?? 😳🧚🏾‍♂️✨

attributes.title: Awful
attributes.review: The app was slow and kept cutting closing itself out. Seemed pretty cheaply developed. Such a waste of time. Need to fix the issues before you try coming out with an app.
